Returns: the content, if this is the first call to this method since @B_org#apache#http#entity#BasicHttpEntity#setContent_E@ has been called
Throws: if the content has been obtained before, or has not yet been provided

BasicHttpEntity().Description: Creates a new basic entity. The content is initially missing, the content length is set to a negative number.

isRepeatable().Description: Tells that this entity is not repeatable.

Parameters: the number of bytes in the content, or a negative number to indicate an unknown length
setContentLength(long).Description: Specifies the length of the content.

consumeContent().Description: Does not consume anything. The default implementation does nothing if @B_org#apache#http#HttpEntity#isStreaming_E@ returns false, and throws an exception if it returns true. This removes the burden of implementing an empty method for non-streaming entities.

Parameters: the stream to return with the next call to @B_org#apache#http#entity#BasicHttpEntity#getContent_E@

ClassDesc: Please use @B_java#net#URL#openConnection_E@ instead. Please visit A generic streamed entity being received on a connection.
